item.title: Aston Villa boss Unai Emery calls for Premier League and UEFA to work together on rule interpretations (Video)
item.description:
Aston Villa had a goal ruled out in their eventually goalless draw against Juventus in the Champions League on Wednesday, and manager Unai Emery appeared frustrated with the difference in officials interpreting the laws of the game between England and the rest of Europe. Aston Villa boss Unai Emery described the decision to rule out […]
